Name: Mind Rite
About the game: Visual novel, detective, otome Aina is a young investigator in a distant town in the north, but when mysterious magical murders begin to take place in it, it is she and her partner who are entrusted with the case. But what if everything is not what it seems? What if Aina herself becomes a victim? Features: Three romanceable characters Many unique endings Colorful illustrations Original soundtrack
